name: Pathlighter (JacknCheese)
description:
Pathlighter is a 1/2 top down adventure game where you play as the pumpkin kid who gets chased by ghosts between the realms of the living and dead. You must use your soul powered flashlight companion to defeat ghosts while maneuvering through dangerous environments and solving puzzles.

Designer/Creative Director: Jack Murray

Environment Artist: Gabby Thompson

Character Artist: Aaron Simons

Programmer: Daniel Arias

UI Artist/Level Designer: Cole Hedlund

Environment Artist: Raul Rodriguez
